meta.name: Test 05: Updated 02
meta.subtitle: Concept map
meta.description: Whats new: Website link to author; Blocks can be placed at any x and y; Each block now can have individual properties, which eliminates a lot of dublicate blocks; added custom icon of the map; now you can link logic script file, which can control and add custom things to maps; Added subtitle, which can provide a short way to describe your map;
meta.author: MrBoomDev
